Title: Big update on its way!
Content: Lots of stuff is coming in next week's update! Character&Staff details, about section in profile, custom anime seasons, better quality show covers, new anime details tab and improved log-in page. I'll be uploading test builds over next few days... if you want to help you can find more info on github :)

Title: Mal is going https...
Content: MAL is switching from http to https... You can expect some features to break, I'll do my best to issue an update asap.

Title: Forums are coming this week!
Content: Forums Beta are coming later this week, with fair share of fixes accross whole app :) Preview versions are as always available on github.

Title: Screw ads!
Content: I was going to add them but this is pure mess. I'm going to encourage dontations though. Instead of losing my time with them I'll finish up forums :D

Title: Monetization discussion.
Content: I want to introduce some form of monetization, if you'd like to make a suggestion feel free to post on github.

Title: Forums!
Content: Forums are now in development, it's pretty hard and WILL take some time but I have the basics figured out :) Screenshots on github (TODO issue).
